summary: This is a brief email chain from March 9, 2020, where an individual asks to be connected to the person handling the Epstein investigation in order to forward a received letter. It indicates ongoing interest or information sharing related to the investigation after Epstein's death.
keyFacts: An email inquiry was made on March 9, 2020, regarding who was handling the Epstein investigation.
The sender wanted to forward a letter they had received related to the investigation.
The document shows continued activity and information flow regarding the Epstein case in March 2020, months after Epstein's death in August 2019.
